akn:section.akn:heading: Treatment of incentive fees for landlords of housing units for failure to remedy health or environme

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2893. Treatment of incentive fees for landlords of housing units for failure to remedy health or environmental hazards The Secretary concerned shall not approve the payment of incentive fees otherwise authorized to be paid to a landlord that the Secretary determines has demonstrated a pattern of failing to remedy, or failing to remedy in a timely manner, a health or environmental hazard at a housing unit provided by the landlord. (Added Pub. L. 116–92, div. B, title XXX, § 3021, Dec. 20, 2019, 133 Stat. 1931; amended Pub. L. 116–283, div. B, title XXVIII, § 2811(f), Jan. 1, 2021, 134 Stat. 4324.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2021—Pub. L. 116–283 substituted “pattern of” for “propensity for”.
